form.label: NMON Solaris WLM: CPU and Memory Statistics of Projects / Zones / Tasks / Users
form.description: WLM Statistics dashboard for Solaris systems

search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM) groupby "WLM.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "WLM.frameID" | sort limit=0 "WLM.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "WLM.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM) (WLM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) groupby "WLM.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "WLM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "WLM.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields WLM.hostname | dedup WLM.hostname | sort WLM.hostname

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM) (WLM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) groupby "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" | sort limit=0 "WLM.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields WLM.device | dedup WLM.device | sort WLM.device

| tstats max("WLM.$report$") AS value from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM.$monitor_cpu_type$) (WLM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) ($device$) `$timefilter$(WLM)` groupby _time, "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("WLM.$report$") AS value by _time, "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" | rename "WLM.hostname" AS hostname, "WLM.device" AS device | stats max(value) AS max_value, avg(value) AS avg_value, min(value) AS min_value by "device" | sort limit=0 "device" | eval value=round(value,2) | fields device,max_value,avg_value,min_value | rename device AS $monitor$ | foreach "*_value" [ eval "<<FIELD>>"=round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | sort - avg_value | rename "*_value" AS "*"

| tstats max("WLM.$report$") AS value from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM.$monitor_cpu_type$) (WLM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($hostname$) ($device$) `$timefilter$(WLM)` groupby _time, "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("WLM.$report$") AS value by _time, "WLM.hostname", "WLM.device" | rename "WLM.hostname" AS hostname, "WLM.device" AS device | stats max(value) AS max_value, avg(value) AS avg_value, min(value) AS min_value by "hostname", "device" | sort limit=0 "hostname" | eval value=round(value,2) | fields hostname,device,max_value,avg_value,min_value | rename device AS $monitor$ | foreach "*_value" [ eval "<<FIELD>>"=round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | sort - avg_value | rename "*_value" AS "*"

div.data-options: {"search": { "type": "token_safe", "value": "| tstats max(WLM.$$report$$) AS value from datamodel=NMON_Data_WLM where (nodename = WLM.$$monitor_cpu_type$$) (WLM.hostname=$$hostname-prefilter$$) ($$frameID$$) ($$hostname$$) ($$device$$) `$$timefilter$$(WLM)` groupby _time, WLM.hostname, WLM.device prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max(WLM.$$report$$) AS value by _time, WLM.hostname, WLM.device | rename WLM.hostname AS hostname, WLM.device AS device | stats $$statsmode$$(value) AS value by device | sort limit=0 device | eval value=round(value,2) | sort - avg_value | head 100"}, "earliest_time": {"type": "token_safe", "value": "$$timerange.earliest$$" }, "latest_time": {"type": "token_safe", "value": "$$timerange.latest$$" }, "auto_cancel": 90, "preview": true }
